description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.Item 1, GSIN: N4510, NSN 4510-20-004-5820, TRAP, GREASEPart No.: 901, NCAGE 10161 ZURN INDUSTRIES LTDQuantity: 15, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB HalifaxItem 2, GSIN: N4510, NSN 4510-20-004-5820, TRAP, GREASEPart No.: 901, NCAGE 10161 ZURN INDUSTRIES LTDQuantity: 20, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB EsquimaltItem 3, GSIN: N4510, NSN 4510-20-004-5828, TRAP, GREASEPart No.: 903, NCAGE 10161 ZURN INDUSTRIES LTDQuantity: 18, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB HalifaxItem 4, GSIN: N4510, NSN 4510-20-004-5828, TRAP, GREASEPart No.: 903, NCAGE 10161 ZURN INDUSTRIES LTDQuantity: 16, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB EsquimaltBidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) ",
full_summary:
**Procurement for TRAP, GREASE**
====================================================

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
--------------------------------

The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit proposals for the procurement of TRAP, GREASE items listed below.

**Item Descriptions**
-------------------

*   Item 1: TRAP, GREASE (GSIN: N4510)
    *** Part No.: 901, ZURN INDUSTRIES LTD (NCAGE: 10161) ***\
    *** Unit of Issue: EA ***\
    *** Quantity: 15 ***\
    *** Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax***
*   Item 2: TRAP, GREASE (GSIN: N4510)
    *** Part No.: 901, ZURN INDUSTRIES LTD (NCAGE: 10161) ***\
    *** Unit of Issue: EA ***\
    *** Quantity: 20 ***\
    *** Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt ***\
*   Item 3: TRAP, GREASE (GSIN: N4510)
    *** Part No.: 903, ZURN INDUSTRIES LTD (NCAGE: 10161) ***\
    *** Unit of Issue: EA ***\
    *** Quantity: 18 ***\
    *** Delivery Location: CFB Halifax ***
*   Item 4: TRAP, GREASE (GSIN: N4510)
    *** Part No.: 903, ZURN INDUSTRIES LTD (NCAGE: 10161) ***\
    *** Unit of Issue: EA ***\
    *** Quantity: 16 ***\
    *** Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt ***


**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

*   Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
*   Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
*   Equivalents or Substitute Products must be indicated by the bidder.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

** Timelines**
-------------

*   **Publication Date:** March 8, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 11, 2023, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None

** Procurement Details**
----------------------

*   **Procurement Reference Number:** PW-23-01029411
*   **Solicitation Number:** W8482-231340/A
*   **Trade Agreements:** WTO GPA, C
